text: @realDonaldTrump So hospitals will have to compete with others in the open market to bid and drive up the price of the masks??! This is how your administration is helping the front-line workers battling the coronavirus - by making sure the middle man gets a piece of the pie financially??! 😡 https://t.co/xlni5ZLhUF
